SELECT DISTINCT A.SABUN AS id , Left(A.req_ymd, 4)||'-'||substring(A.req_ymd,5,2)||'-'||substring(A.req_ymd, 7,2) AS req_ymd, B.book_cd AS book_cd, Left(A.retu_ymd, 4)||'-'||substring(A.retu_ymd,5,2)||'-'||substring(A.retu_ymd, 7,2) AS retu_ymd, A.dept_no AS dept_nm FROM sitlib.bookreq A INNER JOIN sitlib.bookreqhis B ON A.SABUN = B.SABUN AND A.req_ymd = B.req_ymd
